hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.master.business.BusinessActivityEntity (locale.lookUpId ,locale.lookUpValue) from org.mifos.application.master.business.MifosLookUpEntity entity, org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpValueEntity value, org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpValueLocaleEntity locale where entity.entityId = value.lookUpEntity.entityId and locale.lookUpId = value.lookUpId and locale.localeId=:localeId and entity.entityType=:entityType
select locale.lookUpValue from org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpValueLocaleEntity locale where locale.lookUpId = :lookUpId and locale.localeId=:localeId
